name: Stavros Karmanlis
personality: Confident and courageous on the battlefield, but struggles with anxiety outside of combat.
story: Stavros Karmanlis grew up in a small village in Greece. He joined the military at a young age and quickly showed great potential as a soldier. He was promoted to Corporal and developed a reputation as a skilled marksman and an expert in anti-tank tactics. Stavros is married with two children, a son and a daughter. He is dedicated to providing for his family and protecting his comrades on the battlefield.
